document_data.name: Umbeso
document_data.basicrefs: {{cite book/Realms of the Dragons II/Freedom's Promise|172}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Umbeso''' was one of the arcanists from [[Estagund]] that accompanied [[Aniolon Gruanthe]] in his exodus on the {{yearlinkName|976}}.
document_data.Personality: Umbeso proved to be quite curious, to the point of approaching a dragon and being cautious of their gifts.{{cite book/Realms of the Dragons II/Freedom's Promise|172-173}} He was also very decisive.{{cite book/Realms of the Dragons II/Freedom's Promise|171}}{{cite book/Realms of the Dragons II/Freedom's Promise|178-179}}
document_data.Relationships: He had once been one of [[Aniolon Gruanthe]]'s rivals in Estagund.
